game.title: The Last Light
game.beginning: In a world where the sun has ceased to rise, you play as Lumen, the last light bringer, who embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery and bring light back to the world.
game.ending: In the climax, Lumen confronts the Night King, the embodiment of darkness, and after a grueling battle, manages to reignite the sun, bringing light, warmth, and life back to the world.
game.synopsis: The Last Light is an action-adventure game that unfolds in a unique dark world. The player controls Lumen, a light bringer, who has the power to manipulate light in various ways. Lumen journeys through a world that is teetering on the edge of oblivion due to the sun's disappearance. Along the way, players will have to use their wits and skills to overcome various challenges posed by creatures of darkness and intricate puzzles. All while unveiling the truth behind the dying sun and find a way to reignite it. The game presents a continuous tension by blending dark, eerie environments with stunning, beautiful moments when light is introduced.
